thread.title: 5-yr-old girl raped by domestic help

author: Wires English | Press Trust of India
title: 5-yr-old girl raped by domestic help
text:
Bareilly (UP), Oct 20: A five-year-old girl was allegedly raped by a domestic help inside a car in Aonla area here, police said today. (Also Read: Uber cab rape case: Delhi court holds accused Shiv Kumar Yadav guilty of rape) 
The incident took place yesterday when the girl was playing and Aman Maurya (22), engaged as domestic help in the girl’s house, took her inside a car parked in the garage and raped her, Superintendent of Police, Rural, Brijesh Srivastav said. 
The girl’s cousin sister heard her screams and informed the family members, who caught the accused from the spot, the SP said.The girl who was writhing in pain was later taken to hospital where the rape was confirmed, he said adding that the accused has been arrested. 
  3:43 PM Topics:
